description:
Key Responsibilities : Develop and execute sales strategies to identify and secure new sponsors for the Magazine and Recipes sectionManage existing partners / clients and cultivate relationships with brand and marketing agencies for potential partnershipsCollaborate with internal teams to ensure seamless delivery of products / services and meet quarterly sales goalsRequired Qualifications : 5+ years of business development, sales, or digital advertising experience in the culinary or lifestyle industryA proven track record of meeting and surpassing sponsorship sales goalsAbility to thrive in a dynamic, rapidly changing environment and think creativelyProficiency in understanding metrics and measuring resultsA degree in Business or Marketing is highly preferred
